name: Jesse 'Boom' James - a jigsaw chess tale
name_original: Jesse 'Boom' James - a jigsaw chess tale
description:
An innovative jigsaw puzzle with chess-shaped pieces. Solve the puzzles to follow the story of Jesse "Boom" James, one of the wildest gunslinger from our Wild Wild Chess game.

Featuring:
  • Innovative chess-shaped jigsaw puzzle;
  • Play it with regular jigsaw pieces as well;
  • Uncover the story of Jesse "Boom" James by solving 6 different jigsaw puzzles;
  • 4 different sizes for each game mode: Chess-shaped pieces (98, 148, 327 or 580 pieces) and regular pieces (66, 144, 220 or 510 pieces)
  • Beautiful soundtrack;
